org.dynalang.dynalink.support

Class RuntimeContextLinkRequestImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dynalang.dynalink.support.LinkRequestImpl
      • org.dynalang.dynalink.support.RuntimeContextLinkRequestImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LinkRequest

    public class RuntimeContextLinkRequestImpl
extends LinkRequestImpl
    A link request implementation for call sites that pass language runtime specific context arguments on the stack.
    Version:
    $Id: $
    Author:
    Attila Szegedi

    • Constructor Detail

      • RuntimeContextLinkRequestImpl

        public RuntimeContextLinkRequestImpl(CallSiteDescriptor callSiteDescriptor,
                             java.lang.Object[] arguments,
                             int runtimeContextArgCount)
        Creates a new link request.
        Parameters:
        callSiteDescriptor - the descriptor for the call site being linked
        arguments - the arguments for the invocation
        runtimeContextArgCount - the number of the trailing arguments on the stack that represent the language runtime specific context arguments.

    • Method Detail

      • withoutRuntimeContext

        public LinkRequest withoutRuntimeContext()
        Description copied from interface: LinkRequest
        Returns a request stripped from runtime context arguments. Some language runtimes will include runtime-specific context parameters in their call sites as the last few arguments. If a linker does not recognize such contexts at all, or does not recognize the call site as one with its own context, it can ask for the alternative link request with context parameters and arguments removed, and link against it instead.
        Specified by:
        withoutRuntimeContext in interface LinkRequest
        Overrides:
        withoutRuntimeContext in class LinkRequestImpl
        Returns:
        the context-stripped request. If the link request does not have any language runtime specific context parameters, the same link request is returned.

      • replaceArguments

        public LinkRequest replaceArguments(CallSiteDescriptor callSiteDescriptor,
                           java.lang.Object[] arguments)
        Description copied from interface: LinkRequest
        Returns a request identical to this one with call site descriptor and arguments replaced with the ones specified.
        Specified by:
        replaceArguments in interface LinkRequest
        Overrides:
        replaceArguments in class LinkRequestImpl
        Parameters:
        callSiteDescriptor - the new call site descriptor
        arguments - the new arguments
        Returns:
        a new request identical to this one, except with the call site descriptor and arguments replaced with the specified ones.
